snippet.title: The Wolf Among Us - Season Premiere Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare yourself for episode 1 of The Wolf Among Us a video game based on Bill Willingham's FABLES.

Follow The Wolf Among Us at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/the-wolf-among-us/
Official Site - http://www.telltalegames.com/thewolfamongus
